DOC.brief_title: PEAK : Panitumumab Plus mFOLFOX6 vs. Bevacizumab Plus mFOLFOX6 First Line Treatment Metastatic Colorectal Cancer ( mCRC ) Patients With Wild-Type Kirsten Rat Sarcoma-2 Virus ( KRAS ) Tumors
